title: The First Piper
description:
Ross O’Connell Jennings has pipes. Bagpipes, that is! What started as a hobby has become a passion, and now he’s on a mission to do something big.

Follow Ross’ journey on social media: @thefirstpiper

Visit Ross’ website: thefirstpiper.com

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
